label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"食盐中毒","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 食盐中毒：食盐是一种调味品，它可增加饲料的适口性，促进食欲，增强体质；

label: [{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]}]
text: 同时，食盐(氯化钠)又是组成机体的重要成分，是维护鸡体正常生命活动不可缺少的物质。当食入量过大时，则会引起中毒。

label: [{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 或是喂料不及时，造成雏鸡饥饿，大量啄食槽底部残存的含食盐多的沉积细粉料；

label: [{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]}]
text: 或是生产过程中限制饮水时间过长等，都会使食盐在鸡体内含量相对增加，造成中毒。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"幼鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 幼鸡对食盐敏感，容易发生中毒，成年鸡的耐受力较强。

label: [{"start":11,"end":12,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 发生中毒后的临床表现依鸡的日龄和食入量的多少而不同。

label: [{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"食欲废绝","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"渴欲增加","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"胃肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"嗦囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"口鼻","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"下痢","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"表现不安","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":47,"text":"嗦囊肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":59,"text":"大量黏性分泌物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":59,"text":"口鼻中有大量黏性分泌物","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 一般情况是食欲废绝，渴欲增加，当食入量过大时，则刺激胃肠道，发生炎症和下痢，表现不安，嗦囊肿大，口鼻中有大量黏性分泌物；

label: [{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"运动失调","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"步履不稳","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"卧地挣扎","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":34,"end":38,"text":"站立不起","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":43,"end":47,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"肌肉抽搐","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"抽搐","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":53,"end":57,"text":"极度衰弱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":58,"end":63,"text":"虚脱而死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 随着病情的发展，病鸡出现精神沉郁，运动失调，步履不稳，甚至卧地挣扎，站立不起，最后多见呼吸困难，肌肉抽搐；极度衰弱，虚脱而死亡。

label: [{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"食管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":18,"text":"嗦囊黏膜充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"嗦囊黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":30,"text":"嗦囊中有大量黏液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"大量黏液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":39,"text":"嗦囊黏膜脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"嗦囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"嗦囊黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 主要病变在消化道、食管和嗦囊黏膜充血、出血；嗦囊中有大量黏液，有时嗦囊黏膜脱落；

label: [{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"卡他性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":16,"text":"出血性炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"腺胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"小肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"心包积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"心包","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"腹腔积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"肺水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"脑膜炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":33,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 腺胃和小肠可见卡他性或出血性炎症。此外，可见心包积液，腹腔积水，肺水肿，脑膜炎症和出血。

label: [{"start":2,"end":3,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"幼鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":35,"end":38,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 根据鸡的日龄和需要，正确计算用量，幼鸡饲料中按0.1%～0.2%加入，成年鸡按0.2%～0.4%加入。

label: [{"start":3,"end":8,"text":"含盐添加剂","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 当使用含盐添加剂时，应扣除食盐量，避免食入量超标。

label: [{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":0,"end":10,"text":"不可人为造成鸡群饥饿","labels":["control"]},{"start":12,"end":26,"text":"及时清理食槽底部的残存细粉料","labels":["control"]}]
text: 不可人为造成鸡群饥饿，并及时清理食槽底部的残存细粉料；

label: [{"start":3,"end":13,"text":"加入食盐后要搅拌均匀","labels":["control"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"鸡只","labels":["type"]},{"start":34,"end":38,"text":"新鲜饮水","labels":["control"]}]
text: 饲料中加入食盐后要搅拌均匀，避免个别鸡只食入量过大；经常给予充足的、新鲜饮水。

label: [{"start":6,"end":16,"text":"立即停喂原饲料和饮水","labels":["control"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"清理食槽","labels":["control"]},{"start":25,"end":31,"text":"给以新鲜饮水","labels":["control"]},{"start":38,"end":46,"text":"嗦囊中注射温清水","labels":["control"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"嗦囊","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 发生中毒后要立即停喂原饲料和饮水；清理食槽、水槽，给以新鲜饮水，有条件的可于嗦囊中注射温清水或葡萄糖水，如处理及时，轻症者则可康复。

label: [{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"脑炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"脑水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":13,"text":"脑","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 如食人量过大，造成脑炎、脑水肿时，则预后不良。

label: [{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]}]
text: 食盐是家禽日粮中必需的营养物质，但采食过多或食入盐并不多而饮水不足则会引起中毒。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"食盐中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":5,"end":10,"text":"消化道炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":14,"text":"脑水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":12,"text":"脑","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"神经症状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":31,"text":"消化道紊乱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"紊乱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":44,"text":"钠中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":46,"end":50,"text":"急性中毒","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":51,"end":55,"text":"慢性中毒","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 食盐中毒以消化道炎症和脑水肿为病理特征，以神经症状和消化道紊乱为临床特征，其实质是钠中毒，有急性中毒与慢性中毒之分。

label: [{"start":15,"end":20,"text":"鱼粉添加剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]}]
text: 饲料中添加食盐量过大，主要见于鱼粉添加剂过多或使用掺盐的劣质鱼粉，同时饮水不足，或是食盐拌混不匀，即可造成家禽中毒。

label: [{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 饮水中含盐过高或错误地使用补液盐而引起中毒。饥饿雏鸡大量食入食槽底部饲料中的盐沉积物质过多，但饮水不足而中毒。

label: [{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 正常情况下，饲料中食盐添加量为0.25%~0.50%。当雏鸡饮服0.54%的食盐水时，即可造成死亡。

label: [{"start":39,"end":43,"text":"食盐中毒","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 另据报道，饲料中添加20%食盐，只要饮水充足，不至于引起死亡。饮水充足与否，是食盐中毒的重要原因。

label: [{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"维生素E","labels":["drug"]},{"start":20,"end":27,"text":"含硫氨基酸缺乏","labels":["disease"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"食盐中毒","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 饲料中其他营养物质，如维生素E、钙、镁及含硫氨基酸缺乏时，可增加食盐中毒的敏感性。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"无食欲","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":6,"end":12,"text":"饮欲异常增强","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":18,"text":"饮水量剧增","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":28,"text":"鼻流出大量黏液","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"大量黏液","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":35,"text":"嗦囊胀大柔软","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"胀大柔软","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"下痢","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":50,"text":"泄殖腔周围羽毛污染严重","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"嗦囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":20,"text":"口","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":22,"text":"鼻","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":46,"text":"泄殖腔周围羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡无食欲，饮欲异常增强，饮水量剧增。口、鼻流出大量黏液，嗦囊胀大柔软，下痢，泄殖腔周围羽毛污染严重。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"肌肉震颤","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"震颤","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"两腿无力","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"无力","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"共济失调","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"行走困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"瘫痪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"虚脱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"衰竭死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"两腿","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 精神沉郁，肌肉震颤，两腿无力，共济失调，行走困难或瘫痪。呼吸困难，虚脱，最后衰竭死亡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"急性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":6,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":6,"end":12,"text":"头部明显肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"明显肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"皮肤干燥","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"干燥","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":23,"text":"羽毛易脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":23,"text":"易脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":30,"text":"皮下组织水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":42,"text":"胃肠黏膜充","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":42,"text":"充","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":50,"text":"黏膜脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"头部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"皮下组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"食道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"嗦囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"胃肠黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 急性死亡的鸡头部明显肿胀，皮肤干燥，羽毛易脱落。皮下组织水肿，食道、嗦囊、胃肠黏膜充、出血，黏膜脱落。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"心包积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"肺水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":20,"text":"脑膜血管扩张充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"扩张充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":29,"text":"针尖状出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"脑炎症状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"心包","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":9,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"脑膜血管","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 腹腔、心包积液，肺水肿，脑膜血管扩张充血，并有针尖状出血点和脑炎症状。

label: [{"start":0,"end":12,"text":"严格控制饲料中食盐添加量","labels":["control"]},{"start":38,"end":48,"text":"禁止使用掺盐劣质鱼粉","labels":["control"]},{"start":49,"end":60,"text":"残汤剩饭喂鸡要控制用量","labels":["control"]},{"start":54,"end":55,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":61,"end":67,"text":"给予充足饮水","labels":["control"]}]
text: 严格控制饲料中食盐添加量，一般不超过0.3%,并且要将鱼粉的含盐量计算在内。禁止使用掺盐劣质鱼粉，残汤剩饭喂鸡要控制用量，给予充足饮水。

label: [{"start":4,"end":13,"text":"立即停喂可疑的饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":17,"end":24,"text":"改换新鲜的饲料","labels":["control"]}]
text: 发现中毒立即停喂可疑的饲料和饮水，改换新鲜的饲料和饮水。

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"给予大量清洁的水","labels":["control"]},{"start":11,"end":16,"text":"葡萄糖溶液","labels":["drug"]},{"start":34,"end":41,"text":"间断的方式饮水","labels":["control"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"人工助饮","labels":["control"]}]
text: 给予大量清洁的水或5%葡萄糖溶液。严重中毒时忌暴饮，采取多次、少量、间断的方式饮水或人工助饮。
